name: 薛人瑋
objective: 室內空氣品質及室內空氣污染對人體之危害、空氣環境汙染物、換氣與通風、檢測方法、污染源診斷、空氣品質控制及改善、國內外法規、管理計劃規劃。含室內空氣污染物之移除技術、室內空氣清淨機原理應用於室內空氣品質之控制。
schedule:
週數　　課程議題
1　　Source of Indoor Air
2　　Health Effects of Indoor Air Pollution
3　　Risk Assessment
4　　Dynamics of Indoor Air Contaminants
5　　Control of Indoor Air Quality and Climate
6　　Micro-contamination of Cleanroom
7　　Particulate Control
8　　Bio-Decontamination
9　　Cooking Fume Emission Control
10　　Volatile Organic Compounds in Indoor Environments
11　　Emissions of Volatile Organic Compounds
12　　Adsorption and Desorption of Pollutants to and from Indoor Surfaces
13　　Carbon Dioxide Filtration
14　　Airborne Molecular Contamination Control
15　　Acid and Base Exhaust Abatement
16　　Greenhouse Gas Exhaust Abatement
17　　Environmental Risk Management
18　　(Final exam)
scorePolicy:
1.　　Homework 30%：Homework must be handed in during class when the date is due.
※ Late homework – HALF GRADE if handed within a week; ZERO GRADE thereafter.
2.　　Mid-term exam 35%.
3.　　Final exam 35%.
materials:
1.　　Elsevier Science, “Indoor Air Quality” Volume 3.
2.　　Pluschke, Peter, “Indoor Air Pollution”, Springer Link.
3.　　William Whyte, “Cleanroom Technology: Fundamentals of Design, Testing, and Operation”, Wiley.
4.　　ISO 14000.
